title: The Pale Elf
tags: how to unlock the pale elf
content:
Contract. You can choose to complete this quest or continue with Raphael's original bidding and complete Kill Raphael's Old Enemy. Your choices here will affect both quests.

You can follow through with Raphael's request to kill Yurgir and proceed to the next objective. If you decide to go against Raphael. If you agree to help him search the strs to solve the loopholes of his contract, Astarion, Shadowheart and Karlach will disapprove. Keep in mind that if you succeed in breaking the contract a
